Putin Has No Money

The war in Ukraine has been going on for years now, and it seems like there is no end in sight. But there is hope. The people of Ukraine are tired of the fighting and want peace. They are calling on the international community to help them find a solution to the conflict. The world is watching, and the people of Ukraine are hoping for a peaceful resolution to the war.

Absolute Disaster

The people of Ukraine, after years of missile dodging and infrastructure bingo, have apparently decided they're a little bit over it. Reports indicate that they now prefer peace over constant war - an absolutely groundbreaking revelation.

- Jim McNugget

The world is watching
